notes: Tzumrah The Dazzler is a miniboss who visits the [[Forbidden Temple]] once in a while [[Incompetent Idiots (Book)|to oversee the rituals]]. When Tzumrah is present, several [[Enlightened of the Cult]] that are not normally present appear at the last floor.
sounds: Your beating heart will burst into flames!
Your reeking carcass will feed the sharks!
Your living soul will serve my master!
Your warm blood will quench my thirst!
name: Tzumrah the Dazzler
behaviour: Just like an [[Enlightened of the Cult]]. But way stronger. Be careful of its fire beam and fire elementals.
location: [[Forbidden Temple]], near the altar of the last floor {{Mapper Coords|130.54|127.138|11|4|text=here}}.
